title: Gaias
body: In the late 15th century, Braz Gonçalves de Gaias lived in Machico, who was of royal descent. He was one of the early settlers of this island and introduced this surname here, which became extinct.

Machico: Locality on the island of Madeira

Late 15th century: Period when Braz Gonçalves de Gaias lived in Machico
